programme.title: The Hellbenders
programme.desc: After the civil war, a hell-bent Confederate Army Officer and his sons rob a Union Caravan carrying a fortune, killing every man and beast in the process. They hide the money in an empty coffin and hire a woman to pose as a widow to a dead officer to make it look official. Now they must con and fight their way across the west through thousands of cavalry, lawmen, bounty hunters, and Indians to make their escape.

programme.title: Lone Wolf and Cub: Baby Cart to Hades
programme.desc: In a rare moment of compassion, Lone Wolf rescues a girl who has killed a pimp in self-defense. By his code, he is forced to endure being tortured to within an inch of his life. Lone Wolf takes to the road again, where his expertise is very much in demand, so much so that a would-be employer had already had a contract placed on him. The slayer with the baby cart proceeds down bloodstained paths to Hades.

programme.title: Violent City
programme.desc: After being double-crossed by his mistress and barely escaping a murder attempt, a hit-man sets out to take his revenge on the woman and the mob boss who put her up to it.

programme.title: You Cant Win Em All
programme.desc: As the Ottoman Empire collapses throughout Turkey in 1922, a number of adventurers from all over the world sign on to protect the locals from thieves and marauders--for a hefty price. Two such mercenaries are Adam and Josh, who are hired by provincial Turkish governor Osman. Adam and Josh are expected to protect their boss' gold shipment, and to provide safe conduct for Osman Bey's three daughters. Along the way, our 'heroes' decide to forget their mission and abscond with the gold, but their plans are foiled by their own inherent ineptitude--and by the bothersome interference of duplicitous Colonel Elci.

programme.title: Grizzly
programme.desc: An eighteen-foot-tall grizzly bear terrorizes a state park, leaving it up to a Park Ranger to save the day.
